column5: went out last friday to dunk some skien and chunk steel.landed 5 on skien and 1 on a cleo.was able to get 3 pics before the digi died.had to take one pic at my feet because basskicker was busy untangling his line.got out again today in basskickers rig and flat lined on the big o close to shore.i lost one and missed one.basskicker landed a nice fish on a j13.here are a couple of pics from last friday  http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa8/Joh...n/IMG_08291.jpg http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa8/Joh...n/IMG_08281.jpg http://i198.photobucket.com/albums/aa8/Joh...n/IMG_08271.jpg
Nice catch !!!!! great report & pics as well.  ..cheers
Congratz on your fish and thanks for posting 'em for us.  Now I get your handle!  Cheers!
Nice job there guys!  What..no pics of Jason's catch?? haha.  Gotta love it when the fishing is on....see you out there I'm sure!

Hey Cliff, actually we forgot to take pics of both our fish yesterday.....it was a little crazy trying to land a 25lb salmon in my boat out in the big lake with 3-4 rollers and NO NET!!!....interesting to say the least.  Jason
LOL...excuses excuses...I landed a nice one in your old canoe...mind you....in huge 4 inch waves and we had a net....haha.  Talk to you later Jason! Cliff
